p: Swiss albino mice weighing 18–26 g were obtained from Ethiopian Public Health Institute. The mice were kept in plastic cages in environmental conditions (22–24 °C, 12 h: 12 h dark/light cycle), fed a rodent pellet diet and allowed to drink water ad libitum. All mice were housed in standard cages in groups and acclimatized for two weeks before experiment. In acute toxicity study three female mice of the same group were housed together. In repeated-dose toxicity study five per group were housed together.
